Administrative Capacity Building in Drug Proceedings
Heavy Bomb Suits
Building and Improving Chemical, Radiation and Explosion Hazard Response Capacity
Creation of a new field police computer station
Modernization of data communication equipment required for the use of the data center
Creation and Introduction of a New Foreign Police Computer Station in the PBGB (Phase III)
description: The ultimate goal of the multi-stage project was to create a modern, mobile, user-friendly and sustainable ICT solution (foreign police computer workstation) instead of today's e-police solution . The development activities were carried out in several successive stages. By the end of the third phase of the projects started at the end of 2015, all depreciated e-police equipment used in law enforcement patrols was replaced . The high quality ICT support services to ensure the acquired e-police job development and support crew with the necessary tools and esitlusmonitor.Tarkvaratäiendatiuutevõimalustega (two-way exchange of information to the PSAP, automaatkontrolltagaotsitavatetabamiseks, teenistusinfojavälitöö task sharing, voice commands, the Maps new layers of information, etc.). A modern software platform-based information system enables location-independent, mobile and fast (one simple query response on average 3 seconds) access to information needed in policing (searches, identification, vehicles related to a person, punishment of persons, locations of units, etc.). As a result of the project, the speed of responding to the challenge scene remains stable (C-17.2 / B-20.3), and the reliability of police databases is ensured.

name: Development of the demining information system DEMIS
description: The project developed and implemented the DEMIS demining information system software. As a result of the project, the work of the demining center will be more efficient due to better information management, search and analysis capabilities. This will improve the quality and detail of the demining center's challenges, trips, findings and work data.

name: Development of SIS II to enhance the exchange of information on police cooperation
description: The project aims to increase the efficiency of the exchange of information between Member States' police forces . The aim is to supplement and update the functionality and integration of the Estonian part of the Schengen Information System SIS II, ie ESIS2, and related systems , to improve data quality and to create integration capabilities with external information systems .

name: Creation and Introduction of a New Field Police Computer Station in the PBGB (Phase IV)
Security Monitoring System Prototype from Critical Service Provider Computer Networks for Cyber Attacks and Malware Detection
CBRN Capacity Building
Acquisition of a software solution for the prevention of corruption and the detection of crime
Establishment and implementation of the Estonian Passenger Information System
Development of the data warehouse information system of the Rescue Board and the Alarm Center
Improvement of the Radiation Early Warning System
description: The aim of the project is to improve the early warning system for radiation hazards. To this end, ionizing radiation measuring equipment and software for analyzing measurement data will be purchased. As a result of the project, the capacity of the Environmental Board to detect the presence of radioactive contamination in the environment in the event of a radiological emergency or a threat thereof and to identify maliciously installed radiation sources will increase.

name: Participation in CBRN cooperation projects and conducting trainings
Vehicles to combat serious covert crime
Small Bomb Robots
Renewal of CBRN Databases and Licenses
Drug Tester
Terminal device location tuvastaminejajälitusvõimekuse improvement Telekom
description: The aim of the project was to improve the accuracy of the location of a terminal device in the network of mobile operators for security authorities and the Alarm Center. This increases the quality of information and reduces the time it takes to reach those in need.

name: Pilot project for the implementation of the Regulation on the Prevention of the Distribution of Terrorist Web Content
Development and implementation of architectural solutions in the new data center
Creation of a new field police computer station (Phase II)
description: As a result of the second stage of e-police development, a new software and hardware solution was created, which was installed on 212 police and 62 border guard vehicles . The developed solution improves the exchange of information in the field - police patrols and border guards quickly receive relevant information that helps to prevent crime.

name: Investments to ensure the safety of workers at the scene
Acquisition of Mobile Number Recognition and Small X-Rays
Extension of the scope of the operational radio communication network
Maksu- ja Tolliameti ametnike täienduskoolitus „Piirikontrolli teostamine
description: 12.12.2014 jõustus riigipiiri seaduse muudatus, millega tolliametnikele laienesid isikute ja transpordivahenditeriigipiiriületamisekontrollimisegaseotudpolitseiõigusedja kohustused.Schengenipiirieeskirjadesttulenevaltpeavadliikmesriigidtagama,et piirikontrolliteostavadspetsiaalseettevalmistusejanõuetekohaseväljaõppesaanud ametnikud. Projekti raames läbis koolituse 39Maksu- ja Tolliameti ametnikku. Koolitus andis rahvusvaheliseksliikluseksavatudpiiripunktistöötavateletolliametnikelevajalikud teadmised ja oskused isikute ning transpordivahendite piirikontrolli teostamiseks.

name: Multirootorid välispiiril vaatlustegevuse teostamiseks
description: Projekti raames soetati piiriturvalisuse tagamiseks 9 multirootorit, mis aitavad tõsta ebaseaduslike piiriületajate avastamise võimekust ja fikseerimist, suurendada oluliselt parema ülevaate saamist piirilähedasel alal toimuvatest tegevustest, samuti toetada kiiremat ja kuluefektiivsemat patrullide rakendamist piirivahejuhtumite lahendamisel.

name: Veesõidukite ja nende transportimise vahendite soetamine
description: Projekti käigus hangiti hõljuk, hüdrokopterid, kaatrid, mootorpaadid ja vesiskuutrid. Seni kasutuses olnud amortiseerunud kaatrite ja mootorpaatide asendamine uute sõidukitega aitab kaasa reageerimise võimekusele (sh kiiremale reageerimisele) piirirežiimi rikkumistele Euroopa Liidu välispiiril merel ja piiriveekogudel.

name: Soojus- ja öövaatlusseadmete soetamine veesõidukitele
description: Projekti käigus soetati veesõidukitele soojus- ja öövaatlusseadmed, mille tulemusel on kergem tuvastada piirirežiimi eeskirja rikkumisi.

name: Piirivalve ja -kontrolli sideseadmed
description: Sidepidamise turvalisuse tagamiseks kaasajastati piirivalve ja -kontrolli sideseadmed. Seadmete kaasajastamisega tagatakse riigipiiri valvamise võimekus, st ebaseadusliku piiriületuse ennetamine, avastamine ja tõkestamine piiripunktide vahelisel alal.

name: VIS sõrmejäljeskannerite uuendamine
description: Projekti raames vahetati Välisministeeriumi konsulaaresinduste Schengeni viisamenetluse läbiviimisega seotud töökohtadel välja amortiseerunud sõrmejäljeskannerid, et tagada parem ja kvaliteetsem sõrmejäljehõive protsess Schengeni viisamenetluses.

name: Schengeni viisade menetlejate täiendkoolitus 2016
description: Projekti käigus koolitati kolmandates riikides asuvates Eesti välisesindustes töötavaid konsuleid,välisesindustessevastavateleametikohtadeleroteerivaiddiplomaateja Välisministeeriumi konsulaarosakonnas Schengeni viisade menetlemise korraldamisega tegelevaidametnikke.SamutikoolitatiSchengeniviisademenetlemisegategelevate esinduste töötajaid nendes Eesti välisesindustes, kus viisataotlejate seas on kõige rohkem kõrge migratsiooniriskiga isikuid. Projekti jooksul koolitati 52 teenistujat.

name: Viisataotluste kooskõlastamise infosüsteemi loomine (II etapp)
description: Projekti raames loodi PPA-s senistest efektiivsem, töökindlam ja jätkusuutlikum ühtne viisataotlustekooskõlastamiseinfosüsteem,milletulemusenakiirenebjatõhustub viisataotluste menetlemine ning lihtsustub infosüsteemide edasine haldamine ja hooldus.

name: Schengeni teise põlvkonna infosüsteemi (SIS II) funktsionaalsuste, käideldavuse ja andmekvaliteedi parendamine
description: Piiriülese kuritegevuse ohjeldamiseks peab tõhustama võimekust lahendada rahvusvaheliste liikuvate rühmituste toimepandud kuritegusid. Schengeni teise põlvkonna infosüsteem (SIS II)oluliseSchengenikompensatsioonimeetmenapanustabintegreeritudpiirihalduse tugevdamisseaidatesedendadateabevahetustliikmesriikidevaheljaparandada asutustevahelist koostööd. Projekti raames ajakohastati infosüsteemi SIS II, mille tulemusel paranes süsteemi funktsionaalsus, käideldavus ja andmekvaliteet.

name: EL välispiiri valve tõhustamise koolitused II
description: Projekti käigus viidi läbi 4 välispiirihaldusega seotud koolituskursust (ujuvahendi juhtimise koolitus, välismaalaste Eestis ajutise viibimise alused ning seaduse muudatuste koolitused, näotuvastuse baas-koolitus koostöös Saksa politsei ekspertidega, infosüsteemi KILP I mooduli kasutaja-koolitused). Koolitustel osales 187 ametnikku.

name: Mereside raadio- ning andmesidesüsteemide täiustamine
description: Projekti käigus soetati ja paigaldati piirivalvelaevale satelliitside lahendus, mis võimaldab laevaga sidet pidada ja andmesideinfot vahetada varasemast oluliselt tõhusamalt ja tõrkekindlamalt. Tagatud on nõuetekohane piirikontrolli võimekus merel kogu Eesti majandusvööndi ulatuses.

name: Maksu- ja Tolliameti ametnike piirikontrollialane täienduskoolitus II
description: Projekti käigus koolitati välja 14 Maksu- ja Tolliameti ametnikku, kes omandasid piirikontrolli teostamiseks vajalikud teadmised ja oskused. Projekti tulemusel on võimalik veelgi enam kasutada Narva-1 piiripunktis piirikontrolli pädevusega tolliametnikke isikute ja veoautode piirikontrolli teostamisel.

name: Schengeni viisade menetlejate täiendkoolitus 2017
description: Projekti raames koolitati Schengeni viisade menetlemisega seotud konsulaarametnikele, viisaspetsialistidele ja –sekretäridele, 2017. aasta suvel kolmandates riikides asuvatesse välisesindustesse vastavatele ametikohtadele roteerivatele ametnikele ning PPA ametnikele. Kokku toimus kaks koolitust,. Projekti jooksul koolitati 89 teenistujat.

name: ABC-väravate paigaldamise projekteerimine Narva-1 piiripunkti
description: Projekti raames viidi läbi Narva-1 piiripunkti ABC-väravate paigaldamise projekteerimine. Projekteerimise käigus hinnati, kas väravate paigaldamine vajalikus mahus ja soovitavasse asukohta on võimalik ning millised piiripunkti ümberehitustööd on sellest tulenevalt vajalikud.

name: Viisaregistri jätkuarendused viisaeeskirja art 22 rakendamiseks
description: Projekti raames loodud tehnilise lahenduse abil on võimalik avastada isikud, kelle Eestisse saabumine tuleb tõkestada võimaliku migratsiooniriski või avaliku korra ja julgeoleku kaalutlustel. Projekti tulemusena saavad Eesti pädevad asutused õigeaegselt teavet ohtude hindamiseks ja riskide ennetuseks.

name: Maksu-ja Tolliameti ametnike piirikontrollialane täienduskoolitus III
description: Projekti käigus läbisid 15 Maksu- ja Tolliameti teenistujat nõuetekohase koolituse ning omandasid piirikontrolli teostamiseks vajalikud teadmised ja oskused. Projekti tulemusel on tõusnud ametkondade piirikontrolli võimekus Narva-1 piiripunktis.

name: EL välispiiri valve tõhustamise koolitused III
description: Projekti raames viidi läbi 12 koolituskursust PPA ametnikele, et tagada sujuv piiriületus ja tõkestada ebaseaduslik piiriületus, järgides kõiki põhiõigusi.

name: Mereseiresüsteemi auditeerimine
description: Projektiraamesauditeeritimereseiresüsteem,milletulemuselonriigilülevaade mereseiresüsteemi tehnilisest seisukorrast ja uuendamisvajaduste maksumusest.

name: Piirivalve seiresüsteemide raadiolinkide turvamine
description: Projekti raames soetati ja paigaldati raadiolingid koos tarkvaraga, et tagada turvaline ja katkematu infovahetus piirivalve mereseire- ja idapiiri süsteemides ning kordonites.

name: Mereseiresüsteemi ja radarite andmesidevõrgu uuendamine
description: Projekti raames hangiti ja paigaldati uued ruuterid, mille tulemusel tõusis piirivalve mereseiresüsteemi ja radarite andmesidevõrgu töökindlus ja kiirenes seirekaamerate ja radarite info edastamine Eesti merepiiril ning seiret teostavates kordonites.

name: Schengeni viisade menetlejate täiendkoolitus 2018–2019
description: Projekti käigus korraldati 50 viisa spetsialistile ja konsulile kaks koolitust, eesmärgiga tõsta ametnikekvalifikatsiooni,ettagadavälisesindustesühetaoline,sujuvjaefektiivne viisataotluste menetlemine.

name: Viisataotluste kooskõlastamise infosüsteemi loomine
description: Mitme-etapilise projekti I etapi tulemusel koostati põhjalik eelanalüüsidokument, mille tulemid olid II etapi (ISFB-17) arendustööde aluseks.

name: Välispiiri valvamise tehnilised vahendid maismaapiirile
description: Projekti raames uuendatakse piirivalve varustust, et säilitada riigipiiri valve võimekus. Projekti tulemusel on tagatud ebaseaduslike piiriületuste avastamine, fikseerimine ning ülevaate omamine piirilähedastel alal toimuvatest tegevustest. Projekt toetab operatiivsemat ja kuluefektiivsemat patrullide rakendamist piirivahejuhtumite lahendamisel.

name: Automaatse piirikontrolli süsteemi rajamine (Tallinna-1 ja Narva-1)
description: Projekti eesmärk on väljaspoolt Schengeni ala saabuvate reisijate voo sujuvamaks muutmine automaatse piirikontrolli (ABC) süsteemi kasutusele võtu kaudu. Projekti raames on renditud Tallinn-1 ja Narva-1 piiripunktidesse 16 ABC-väravat. 2022. a paigaldatakse Saatse piiripunkti iseteeninduskiosk.

name: EBCGA erimeede CPB-RHIB
description: PPAsoetasvälispiirivalvamisekskiirkaatri2020.a.2022.ahangitaksekaatri transportimiseks treiler ning vedukauto. Kaater antakse Euroopa Piiri- ja Rannikuvalve Ameti kasutusse 4 kuuks aastas.

name: EES ja ETIAS rakendamine
description: Projekt on osa Euroopa Parlamendi ja Nõukogu 30. novembri 2017. a määruse nr (EL) 2017/2226 ning Euroopa Parlamendi ja Nõukogu 12. septembri 2018. a määruse nr (EL) 2018/1240 õigeaegseks rakendamiseks elluviidavate projektide kogumist. Projekti eesmärk on kaardistada riiklike süsteemide arendusvajadused ning koordineerida seotud projektide üleselt riiki sisenemise ja riigist lahkumise süsteemi (EES) ning Euroopa reisiinfo- ja lubade süsteemi (ETIAS) arendusi ning soetusi.

name: Määruse EL 2017/2226 art 64 (1) ja (2) rakendamine – EES arendustööd
description: Projekt on osa Euroopa Parlamendi ja Nõukogu 30. novembri 2017. a määruse nr (EL) 2017/2226 õigeaegseks rakendamiseks elluviidavate projektide kogumist. Projekti eesmärk on valmistada ette ning realiseerida määruse täitmiseks vajalikud arendused piirikontrolli infosüsteemi ja hõiveseadmete integreerimiseks ning andmevahetuseks riiki sisenemise ja riigist lahkumise infosüsteemiga.

name: Maksu-ja Tolliameti ametnike piirikontrollialane täienduskoolitus IV
description: 17 tolliametnikku läbisid koolituse, mille tulemusel on neil õigus teha politsei asemel esimese astme piirikontrolli: Sillamäe sadamas (laevade ja laevameeskondade kontroll); Narva 1 piiripunkti veokite terminalis.

name: Schengeni viisade menetlejate täiendkoolitus 2019–2020
description: Projekti eesmärk oli aidata korrektse ja efektiivse viisataotluste menetlusega kaasa Schengeni alaturvalisusetagamisse.Projektiskoolitativiisasekretäre,-spetsialisteja konsulaarametnikke.

name: Mereseire märgiserverite uuendamine
description: Projekti käigus vahetati osaliselt välja mereseiresüsteemi vananenud komponendid, mille tulemusel saavad mereseire operaatorid kvaliteetsema radaripildi.

name: EL üleste infosüsteemide koostalitlusvõime koordineerimine
description: Projekti eesmärk on aidata kaasa kohustuslike EL üleste infosüsteemide (EES, ETIAS, VIS, Eurodac; SIS, ECRIS-TCN) ja koostalitlusvõime komponentide tähtaegsele valmimisele.

name: Kordonite ja piiripunktide videovalveserverite uuendamine
description: Projektikäigusuuendativideovalveservereid,milletulemuseltõusiskordoniteja piiripunktide videovalvesüsteemi efektiivsus ja töökindlus

name: Schengeni viisade menetlejate täiendkoolitus
description: Koolituste eesmärk oli Eesti välisesindustes ja välispiiril Schengeni viisade taotluste menetlemine sujuvalt ja kvaliteetselt, tagades seeläbi Eesti ja Schengeni ruumi julgeolek. Projekti käigus viidi läbi kaks koolitust Välisministeeriumi ning Politsei- ja Piirivalveameti teenistujatele. Enim tähelepanu pöörati viisataotlejatelt sõrmejälgede hõivamisele ja VISiga seotud küsimustele. Teine koolitus oli suunatud konsulite ja julgeolekuasutuste vahelisele koostööle. Projekti jooksul koolitati 110 teenistujat.

name: Määruse EL 2017/2226 art 64 (1) ja (2) rakendamine – EES arendustööd II
description: Projekti eesmärk on Euroopa Parlamendi ja nõukogu 30. novembri 2017. a määruse EL 2017/2226, millega luuakse riiki sisenemise ja riigist lahkumise süsteem liikmesriikide välispiire ületavate kolmandate riikide kodanike riiki sisenemise ja riigist lahkumise andmete ja sisenemiskeelu andmete registreerimiseks ning määratakse kindlaks riiki sisenemise ja riigist lahkumise süsteemile õiguskaitse eesmärgil juurdepääsu andmise tingimused ning millega muudetakse Schengeni lepingu rakendamise konventsiooni ning määruseid (EÜ) nr 767/2008 ja (EL) nr 1077/2011 õigeaegne rakendamine Eestis.

name: Seiretehnika testimine idapiiril
description: Projektieesmärkonmaismaapiirilekuluefektiivseimaseiretehnikakombinatsiooni väljaselgitamine.

name: SIS määruste rakendamise tugi
description: Projekti eesmärk on määruste (EL)2018/1860, (EL)2018/1861 ja (EL)2018/1862 õigeaegse rakendamise koordineeritud toetamine.

name: KILP arendamine (piiripunktid, laevastik ja merepiirivalve)
description: Projekti tulemusel loodi KILP-i: •laevastiku (merepiirivalve) ja piiripunktide teenistuse planeerimise (inimressurss ja varustus) funktsionaalsused; •piiripunktide, laevastiku ja merepiirivalve sündmuste ja teabe haldamise/juhtimise funktsionaalsused, sh merekaardi haldamine.

name: SIS Recast
description: Projekti eesmärk on viia riiklik Schengeni infosüsteem, SIRENE ja liidesed teiste infosüsteemidega kooskõlla määrustega (EL)2018/1860, (EL)2018/1861 ja (EL)2018/1862.

name: Määruse EL 2018/1240 rakendamine – ETIAS riikliku üksuse käivitamine
description: Projekti eesmärk on ETIAS riikliku üksuse käivitamine (töökohtade loomine, mehitamine ja koolitamine).

name: Määruse EL 2018/1240 rakendamine – ETIAS arendustööd
description: Projekti eesmärk on riiklike migratsioonijärelevalves kasutatava infosüsteemi Illegaal2 ja piirikontrolli andmekogu PIKO liidestamine ühtse ETIAS kesksüsteemiga ning riikliku ETIAS jälgimisnimekirja liidestamine ETIAS keskse jälgimisnimekirjaga.

name: Maksu- ja Tolliameti ametnike piirikontrollialane täiendkoolitus V
description: Projekti eesmärk on välja õpetada 20 tolliametnikku, kes hakkavad täitma I-astme piirikontrolli ülesandeid.

name: Hõiveseadmed Schengeni viisade menetlemiseks
description: Projekti eesmärk on osta ja integreerida sõrmejäljeskännerid, et tagada biomeetriliste andmete hõivamise ja kontrollimise kaudu Schengeni viisade väljastamine ainult selleks õigust omavatele isikutele.

name: Arvutid Schengeni viisade menetlejatele
description: Projektikäigusvahetativäljakolmandatesriikidesasuvates16konsulaaresinduses viisamenetlejate kasutuses olevad töökoha arvutid, mis olid vanemad kui 5 aastat. Välja vahetati 36 lauaarvutikomplekti ning 11 sülearvutit. Projekti raames hangitud arvutite kasutamisega kiirenes ja lihtsustus viisade menetlemise protsess.

name: Eritransport patrullimiseks piiril raskesti läbitaval maastikul ja/või keerulistes ilmastikuoludes
description: Projekti tulemusel soetati 45 maismaasõidukit (UTV-d, mootorkelgud, koerahaagised, jalgrattad). Kaasaegsete eritranspordisõidukite soetamisega paranes sõidukipargi tehniline valmisolek patrullide läbiviimiseks ja on tagatud kiirem reageerimine piirijuhtumitele raskesti läbitaval maastikul ning keerulistes ilmastikuoludes.

name: Patrullsõidukite soetamine
description: Projekti tulemusel vahetati välja 96 juba amortiseerunud ja suure läbisõiduga patrullsõidukit. Paranes oluliselt üldine patrullsõidukite tehniline valmisolek ningon tagatud kiirem reageerimine piirijuhtumitele

name: Piirikontrolli- ja migratsioonijärelevalve vahendite uuendamine
description: Projekti raames soetati täiendavaid kontrollvahendeid välispiiril kvaliteetse ja tulemusliku piirikontrolli teostamiseks. Piirikontrolli vahenditega varustati kõik I ja II astme piirikontrolli töökohad. Lisaks tõsteti kordonite võimekust dokumentide kontrolli teostamiseks.

name: EL välispiiri valve tõhustamise koolitused
description: Projekti raames koolitati 533 teenistujat. Omandatud oskuseid ja teadmisi kasutavad ametnikud igapäevaselt piiriületajaid kontrollides ning nendega suheldes. Väikelaevajuhtide koolituse käigus omandasid ametnikud uusi praktilisi oskusi, mis tagavad ujuvvahendite tõhusa, oskusliku ning ohutu kasutamise. Tõusnud on piirikontrollimeetmete rakendamise efektiivsus ning piiri valvamise võimekus tervikuna.

name: Sertifikaatide kontrollimise ühtse kontaktpunkti (SPOC) loomine
description: Projekti tegevuste käigus loodi ja rakendati teiste liikmesriikidega sertifikaatide vahetuse teenus. Uue infosüsteemi kasutuselevõtmine aitab välistada dokumendivõltsinguid ja valeidentiteedi kasutamist.

name: Terminalseadmeasukoha tuvastaminejajälitusvõimekuse parandamine Telekomis
description: Projekti eesmärk oli parandada mobiilsideoperaatorite võrgus oleva terminalseadme asukoha täpsust julgeolekuasutuste ning Häirekeskuse jaoks. Seeläbi tõuseb info kvaliteet ja väheneb abivajajani jõudmise aeg.

name: Kriminaalluurevõimekuse tõstmine
description: Projektieesmärkolikriminaalluurevõimekusetõstminevaldkondlikekoolituste, jätkusuutlikukoolitussüsteemiloomise,parimapraktikatundmaõppimisening kriminaalpolitsei tööks vajaliku IT-lahenduse loomise abil.

name: CBRNi võimekuse tõstmine
description: Projekti eesmärk oli tõsta CBRN (keemiliste, bioloogiliste, radioloogiliste ja tuumaainete) ründeainete tuvastamise võimekust ning sündmustele reageerijate elu ja tervise kaitset (soetati vajaminevat varustust CBRN valdkonnas).

name: CBRNiandmebaasideja litsentside uuendamine
description: Projekti raames uuendati CBRN (keemiliste, bioloogiliste, radioloogiliste ja tuumaainete) seadmete andmebaase ning soetati raamatukogu.

name: CBRNikoostööprojektides osalemine ning koolituste läbiviimine
description: Projekti raames korraldatakse valdkondlikke koolitajalt-koolitajale koolitusi ning nii teoreetilisi kui praktilisi üle-Eestilisi koolitusi koostöös partneritega.

name: Kuritegevuse tõkestamine läbi inimkaubanduse ennetamise
description: Projektiraamesviidiläbiennetustegevusielanikkonnateadlikkusetõstmiseks inimkaubanduse erinevatest vormidest, nende hoiakute kujundamiseks ja kannatanutele mõeldud teenuste juurde suunamiseks läbi eri kanalite (veebikeskkond, tänavareklaam, reklaamklipid avalikes kohtades, sh ühistranspordis).

name: Demineerimistööde infosüsteemi DEMIS arendamine
description: Projekti raames arendati välja ja juurutati demineerimistööde infosüsteemi DEMIS tarkvara. Projekti tulemina on demineerimiskeskuse töö tõhusam tänu kvaliteetsemale info haldamise, otsingu ja analüüsimise võimekusele. Seeläbi paraneb demineerimiskeskuse väljakutsete, väljasõitude, leidude ja tööde andmestiku kvaliteet ja detailsus.

name: Päästeameti ja Häirekeskuse valdkonna andmelao infosüsteemi väljaarendamine
description: Projekti eesmärk oli juurutada Päästeametis ja Häirekeskuses tänapäeva vajadustele vastav, operatiivselt kasutatav ning arendatav andmeladu-infosüsteem. Projekti tulemusena paraneb nimetatud asutuste analüüsivõimekus ja kiirenevad analüüsiprotsessid, mis võimaldab paremat ressursiplaneerimist ning täpsemat riski- ja ohuhinnangute prognoosimist.

name: Keelekoolitus julgeolekuasutuse ametnikele
description: Projekti eesmärk on keeleõppe kaudu parandada Kaitsepolitseiameti võimekust ennetada võimalikke ohte riigi julgeolekule.

name: Uue välipolitsei arvutitöökoha loomine

name: Uue välipolitsei arvutitöökoha loomine ja juurutamine PPA-s (III etapp)
description: Mitme-etapilise projekti lõppeesmärgiks oli luua tänase e-politsei lahenduse asemele kaasaegne,mobiilne,kasutajasõbralikjajätkusuutlikIKT-lahendus(välipolitsei arvutitöökoht). Arendustegevused viidi läbi mitmes järjestikuses etapis. 2015.alõpusalustatudprojektidekolmandaetapilõpuksvahetativäljakõik korrakaitselisespatrulltegevuseskasutatavadamortiseerunude-politseiseadmed. KvaliteetseIKT-tugiteenusetagamisekssoetatie-politseitöökohaarendus-ja tugimeeskonnalevajalikudtöövahendidjaesitlusmonitor.Tarkvaratäiendatiuute võimalustega (kahepoolne infovahetus Häirekeskusega, automaatkontroll tagaotsitavate tabamiseks, teenistusinfo ja välitöö ülesannete jagamine, häälkäsklused, kaardirakendusele uued infokihid jne.). Kaasaegsel tarkvaraplatvormil baseeruv infosüsteem võimaldab asukohast sõltumatut, mobiilset ja kiiret (ühe lihtpäringu vastus keskmiselt 3 sekundit) ligipääsu politseitöös vajaminevale infole (tagaotsimised, isiku tuvastus, isikuga seotud sõidukid, isikute karistatus, üksuste asukohad jms). Projekti tulemuselpüsib väljakutse sündmuskohale reageerimise kiirus stabiilsena (C-17,2/B-20,3), tagatud on politsei andmebaaside suurem töökindlus.

name: Korruptsiooni ennetamiseks ja kuritegude tuvastamiseks vajaliku tarkvaralahenduse soetamine

Hangitud tarkvarad ja uuendused muudavad arvutikriminalistika protsesse kiiremaks ja automaatsemaks, mis omakorda aitavad navigeerida suure hulga andmete seas ja kiirendavad andmete leidmist, töötlust, konverteerimist ning analüüsi, mille tulemusena tõuseb kohtukõlbulike tõendite arv ja kvaliteet.

name: SIAM-SIVE Equipment Supply
description: SIAM uses the Centinela program, which "allows to know in just a few seconds and automatically if a car that crosses the border is stolen, has false license plates or has undergone any suspicious transformation". This technology uses a video system that analyzes the information and sends the corresponding data to the Civil Guard servers. In the event of an anomaly, the SIAM provides a complete tourism history to the station agent through a mobile device within four seconds, informing him of both the irregularity and the guidelines to follow. The project consists of acquiring software and systems integration for border control supplied by the Sentinel program for the control of regulated borders and SIVE Surveillance for the unregulated ones.

name: modernization and expansion of SIVE Almería
description: The objective of the SIVE system is to guarantee the coverage of the southern border of the European Union, enhancing the effectiveness of the Civil Guard in the performance of this function by establishing an operating system in the fight against illegal immigration, fundamentally against networks crafty. Today there are limitations in the operation of this system in the province of Almería, mainly due to the wear of the equipment, the obsolescence of the system technology and the need to implement new technologies, in coherence with the evolution of the system. . Consequently, and in order to maintain the system's operability in the province of Almería, it is necessary to update and modernize it.

Family planning. Maternity support and guidance groups. Working group and teaching report Traveling exhibition Awareness workshops

name: Complementary aid for the payment and advance payment of the contributory unemployment benefit
description: Provide complementary aid to the accumulated and advance payment of the contributory unemployment benefit (APRE) to non-EU foreign workers and their relatives up to the second degree who voluntarily return to their countries of origin, taking into account their vulnerability as a priority selection criterion. Nationals of third countries who are in a regular administrative situation and have recognized the right to payment of unemployment benefit in its modality established in article one of Royal Decree-Law 4/2008 of September 19, may be beneficiaries of this program , on accumulated and advance payment of unemployment benefit to non-EU foreign workers without dual nationality (if any of them is Spanish or EU)

name: Together we make our neighborhood: Intercultural citizenship and social cohesion in La Macarena
description: Intervention at the community level to favor the integration of NTP and promote coexistence relations in an area characterized by the coexistence of citizens of different origins, cultures, ethnicities and religions. The intervention supported by shared work with social, public and private agents, aimed at avoiding and / or overcoming situations of social exclusion derived from the high rate of diversity in the area and promoting the development of a shared and inclusive local space. It is articulated around 4 areas of action: Coexistence, Education, Social Services and Inclusion and Health, which work in coordination to cover needs detected and that affect the coexistence relations between native and immigrant neighbors. It may include rapprochement and dialogue actions between the NTP and the host society, article 9 f) Regulation 516/2014.

It may include actions to bring the population of the host society and NTP closer together, as provided for in article 9 f) of Regulation 516/2014.

The project consists of renewing the servers at the end of their life 12/31/2018. On the other hand, the expansion of the information safeguarding and recovery system is required in the event of disasters of any nature, and the acquisition of protection, interconnection and licenses elements to host the aforementioned tools. Start date: 12/03/2018 Activities: Purchase of servers, backup, and storage software Results: Better service to law enforcement authorities on organized crime and terrorism. It tries to guarantee the reception of young refugees or IP applicants with special bio-psycho-social vulnerability, through individualized itineraries, developing specialized transversal and complementary actions that respond to their needs and promote their autonomy.

name: KLEOS: Asylum, refuge and people under international protection. Awareness Campaign
description: Awareness-raising project at the state level, which aims to promote the commitment of organizations to the reception of IP applicants and beneficiaries, offers accurate information on the situation of people in need of IP, contextualizing said situation with the socio-economic and geopolitical reality of each zone. In turn, an analysis of the media and public opinion discourse is carried out in order to detect news that incites rejection towards the refugee population and IP applicants or those that promote hate speech. It is about creating channels that develop an alternative, inclusive and truthful communication that contributes to changing attitudes and promoting the integration of these beneficiaries. The relevance of the project is framed within Art. 5 of Regí 516/2014 and PN ONIOEl actions of reception and integration in asylum.

name: Information and awareness for the promotion of a society without discrimination

The main activities are: Spanish literacy and culture courses, Spanish and Catalan language courses, cultural activities and participation in community activities. . Most of the activities are carried out in the center of the Cas Serres neighborhood of Ibiza, which concentrates the greatest demand from the NTP group at risk of social exclusion in the island's municipalities. It may include actions for rapprochement and dialogue between the host society and NTP, according to article 9 f) of Regulation 516/2014.

Training, through seminars to train and involve social agents. 5. Promotion and presentation of complaints in the Public Prosecutor's Office of hate crimes. 6. Permanent dissemination action of the Solidarity Offices (internet and advertising dissemination campaigns). 7. Edition of triptychs and material of Solidarity with the victim.

description: Project focused on promoting the autonomy and responsibility of the NTPs, the constructive dialogue between the NTPs and the host society and developing actions that favor equal access and results, including the adaptation of (educational) services to deal with the NTPs . Valenciana, Extremadura and / or the Basque Country, in areas priority care with a high rate of NTP. Actions: - Presentation of the project in 30 cloisters / school councils - Realization of 2 trainings of teachers in interculturality - Execution of 1800 interventions in NTP minors and 300 in families - Organization of 30 days of open doors - Evaluation of the process - Dissemination of the results

name: Awareness for equal treatment and non-discrimination

Actions: -Analysis of the migratory reality through the preparation and dissemination of reports (Annual report and visual report) -Awareness raising in schools through three workshops.

name: APIS(Advanced Passenger Information System)
Support work for the modernization of border controls
description: The objective of this action is to obtain specialized services to carry out consulting activities, definition of technological solutions, preparation of documentation and monitoring of projects within the scope of the Secretary of State for Security, and in collaboration with the National Corps of Police, for the successful deployment of technified systems for the development of the Project, known as "Smart Borders", for reasons of efficiency and due to the insufficient means available to the Ministry of the Interior with the degree of technical specialization required.

Specific objectives: To inform third-country nationals about the society that receives them and actions that allow them to adapt to it, learn about their rights and obligations, and participate in civil and cultural life. Encourage equal access and results to resources for NTP Encourage contact and constructive dialogue between third-country nationals and the society that receives them and actions to promote acceptance

name: Network of intercultural schools: awareness program on cultural diversity
description: General objective: Promote equality of access and results, including the adaptation of educational services and professionals to deal with NTP, enhancing the integration of NTP through actions that enhance their acceptance by the national population at the institutional level and community.

name: System for the management of audio, location, positioning and video with intelligence functions
description: The objective of this action is the acquisition of surveillance systems and equipment, video, audio, location and GPS positioning that allow monitoring by video surveillance of strategic places, capable of performing intelligence functions, to provide information units and centers of command and control to the National Police Corps, with the objective of the fight against terrorism.

name: Travel expenses of returnees and management of forced return
description: The project includes the cost of managing the forced return of NTP citizens who are in an irregular situation in Spain. Expenditure includes transport on airlines (individual tickets and charter flights) and maritime. Spending is charged from January 2015 to June 2016 A similar project was presented at FAMI 2015 (period between March 2014 and July 2015) _ EU contribution declared 4,933. € 513.88 _ project closed There is an overlap of expenditure charged in 2015 (January-July) that does not lead to duplication in the financing request, the expenditure charged in FAMI 2015 corresponds to international transfers and the expenditure of FAMI 2017 corresponds to national transfers The project includes the cost of individual tickets covered by art. 73 of Law 5/2002 of December 30. Open procedure is indicated, since it covers the greater volume of imputed expense.

name: Foresign-Sign Language and equal treatment for deaf immigrants
description: The project is aimed at foreign nationals of third countries with hearing difficulties. Operational objectives: - Acquire basic knowledge of the sign language and culture of the country of arrival, - Guarantee through prevention and awareness-raising access to an active participation of deaf minors, - Provide information and existing resources through the web and app . Actions planned: - Online training in Spanish sign language, - Prevention and awareness workshops on cultural diversity, - Redesign of the website and development of an app on the Informative Guide for deaf immigrants.

name: Integrated: program for the social advancement of immigrant women
description: Course objective: To promote the autonomy and capacities of NTP women in vulnerable situations through the exchange of experience and the creation of networks. Specific objectives: OE1. Information and adequate guidance focused on its integration OE2. Promote social participation and cohesion SO3. Provide tools that facilitate healthy free time self-planning SO4. Develop networking SOE5. Fight against discrimination against immigrant women SO6. Generate publicity for the project, improving the coverage and scope of the actions Actions: First reception and personal interview Individual and therapeutic family care Individual intervention Group workshops Leisure outings School families Awareness and dissemination

name: Up-to-date training of the Acobe team on Asylum and International Protection
description: The project is aimed at increasing and updating the knowledge of the ACOBE work team (Contratadas / os y Voluntariado) about Asylum and IP, it tries to provide training for professionals who serve BPI in the field of reception, orientation, care social, psychological and legal). To this end, they plan to carry out different training actions Basic training in Asylum for the entire Acobe team (34 people, hired and volunteers), which will include legal aspects of asylum at national and European level and intervention methodology with applicants and beneficiaries of IP . Specialized training in legal matters. With these training cycles, the entity will prepare an action protocol that will be published in the form of a Manual and will be distributed among the entity's headquarters and other related organizations, to facilitate the intervention with BPI.

name: Personal expenses deployed in third countries for border control
description: Summary: Expenses of personnel deployed in third countries for border control, operating expenses associated with staff endowments (allowances, accommodation, ...). F. Start: 04/01/2015 Planned Activities: The operating expenses of the personnel deployed in different countries for the prevention and border control of irregular immigration, are the object of the Project at hand. Results: With personnel in third countries, the great effort involved in the objective of preventing and combating irregular immigration is supported, both in its security and humanitarian aspects, in the different facets that such deployment entails, such as the maintenance of personnel liaison, as well as the continuity of training and joint patrolling, improving the efficiency of the objective of preventing and combating irregular immigration.

name: Comprehensive program to promote coexistence Mun neighborhood of all
description: General objectives: Facilitate the integration process of NTP people in the neighborhoods of the southern area of Algeciras, Cádiz, Andalusia. Specific Objectives: Promote the autonomy of NTPs through training actions (including language training). Provide psychological, social and legal advice and assistance. Inform the NTP about the society that receives them and actions that allow them to adapt to it (duties, obligations, culture, values). Promote contact and constructive dialogue between the NTPs and the society that receives them. Encourage equal access and equal outcomes, including tailoring these services to deal with NTP

name: Ventilla catwalk. Comprehensive care project. Madrid. Continuity project
description: The objective is comprehensive intervention in neighborhoods with a high presence of third-country nationals. The actions will be aimed at promoting rapprochement between the host population and NTP, as provided in article 9 of Regulation 516/2014, The project is developed in the Ventilla-Almenara neighborhood, with a high cultural diversity, the result of the presence of people of migrant origin and other ethnic minorities; that together with the serious social inequalities existing in the neighborhood (poverty, unemployment, social exclusion, educational deficits, etc.) make necessary an action that links socio-economic rights and basic cultural rights to prevent conflicts over scarce resources, improve coexistence and anticipate possible social discrimination.

Planned Activities: Execution of consulting work in support of the National Center for the Protection of Critical Infrastructures (CNPIC) for the design of an evaluation and certification methodology in physical security at a general and sectoral level that helps to a comprehensive security certification standard critical infrastructure. Results: Design of a Security Certification Scheme in Critical Infrastructures, which entails the improvement of the threat assessment

name: Acquisition of vehicles and computer tools for border control

Main activities: Processing of contract files for the acquisition of two thousand licenses, five Intel servers and ten mobile foreign identification offices. Expected results: the execution of this project has made it possible to improve the equipment of the units in charge of the fight against irregular immigration and the control of the external borders of the European Union.

Networking with the Barcelona City Council, NGO.

name: Psychological support program for employability victims Madrid ^
description: Multi-year project (Psychological support workshops to improve employability aimed at victims of terrorism in different Autonomous Communities). F. Start: November 2016 Planned activities: Development of a workshop and individual interviews with victims of terrorism and their families Results: Learning space and open communication, individualized support that has created a higher level of trust, high level of participation, increased level of motivation, implementation of search actions and knowledge for the management of the action plan, achievement of group cohesion, monitoring and high level of involvement

Raise awareness and inform agents and technicians who carry out their activity in areas where they may encounter a possible NTP victim of trafficking Actions: Inform and detect possible NTP victims. Awareness aimed at the general population and NGO professionals.

Expand and promote social support networks through group work. Increase psychological well-being through group work. Promote mother-child relationships. Enhance the role and knowledge of women about their health and well-being through web 2.0 technology. Planned actions: Attention, counseling, individual psychological support. Health education groups. Health training therapy groups.

name: Solidarity of responsibilities in the IP of the MENAS: awareness and training
description: The project is aimed at professionals, volunteers and agents involved in the processes of care, intervention and integration and aims to sensitize and train professionals and key agents in the field of childhood, trafficking and IP to improve practices in identification, intervention and networking with Minor applicants or IP beneficiaries. The project is framed in Art.5 Regí 516/29014 and PN ONIOEl Reception and integration actions in asylum. Participating in the project is a network of professionals from related organizations and institutions that the entity has led in recent years, made up of UNHCR, UNICEF, Save the Children, CEAR, ACCEM, Fundación Amaranta, the Santander Chair of Law and Minors and the Institute University of Migrations of the Pontifical University of Comillas in Madrid; with the collaboration of Womens Link Worldwide and Apramp.

name: Training for professionals and volunteers for quality social intervention in IP
description: The project is aimed at CEAR professionals and volunteers who carry out their activity within the framework of the reception and integration of IP applicants and beneficiaries. Its objectives are: To improve the quality and effectiveness of the services provided at the state level by professional and voluntary contracted personnel within the framework of the service to the beneficiary group. The planned Actions: - Identification of training needs. - Design and communication of the training plan. - Preparation of materials and documentation. - Execution of the training program at the state level. - Continuous monitoring and final evaluation of the training plan. - Design, development, implementation and management of an online training platform. - Organization of spaces (physical and online) for meeting and exchanging experiences, knowledge and good practices.

name: Counseling and psychological and sexual support for immigrant women.
description: General objective: To promote the autonomy of NTP women by providing counseling and assistance in psychological and sexual and reproductive health areas and preventing and acting on situations of gender violence in Tenerife and Gran Canaria. Specific objectives: -To promote personal well-being to prevent and promote sexual and reproductive health. -Inform, guide and train in sexual and reproductive health. -Foster empowerment processes that facilitate decision-making. -Identify situations of gender violence and sexual violence, and intervene through psychological support. Actions: -Design, preparation, selection and adaptation of work materials and individual attention. -Impartition of training actions. -Preparation of information instruments and their dissemination. -Intervention, counseling and psychological support

name: Muslim woman in the fight against Islamophobia
description: General objective: Promote equality of access and results, including the adaptation of services to deal with Muslim NTP women, enhancing their autonomy, in the communities of Galicia and the Basque Country. Specific objectives: -Foster the integration processes of Muslim migrant women through training, empowerment and participation processes. -To provide tools to society and professionals to improve the intervention processes of these women. Actions: -Preparation of a work protocol with a gender perspective and for the detection of cases of violence, trafficking - Identification of Muslim migrant women and start-up of groups and training program - Holding of a Seminar; preparation and dissemination of a synthesis publication and intervention guide in focal meetings

name: Support maintenance SCEPYLT ((Control System Protection Explosives Fight Terrorism)
description: SCEPYLT (System for the Control and Protection of Explosives for the Prevention and Fight Against Terrorism) was born from a meeting of the Ministers of the Interior of the G-5 member states (Germany, France, United Kingdom, Italy and Spain), held in Sheffield in July 2004, in which it was agreed to promote work related to the control of explosives in the European Union, within the framework of the fight against terrorism, designating Spain to lead the work for its development. Its purpose is to establish a mechanism for the prevention of terrorist acts based on the exchange of information between participants and authorized movements of explosives in real time to anticipate and investigate possible crimes committed in relation to these matters. The part of the project that is imputed is the expenses incurred by meeting and maintenance file of the computer tool

Sectorial strategic plans, urban transport and food
description: One of the main functions entrusted to the CNPIC is the elaboration of Sectorial Strategic Plans for each of the twelve strategic sectors established in the annex to Law 8/2011, which establishes the measures for the Protection of Infrastructures Critics. Currently, 10 Strategic Plans have been developed for the Energy, Financial System, Nuclear Industry, Water and Transportation Sectors. The project is the continuation of the elaboration of the sectoral strategic plans (PES) of urban transport, health and food, ending with the layout of the same. The work will consist of converting the Plans prepared in Word software format to one in Adobe InDesign software format.

name: Educational and social integration for immigrant students

name: Prevention and intervention against female genital mutilation (FGM)

Actions: - Carrying out 5 workshops for the immigrant population on the prevention of FGM - Organization of 6 courses for professionals who care for the population with risk of FGM - Edition and distribution of 5000 brochures to raise awareness and prevent FGM - Realization of the VI International Days on FGM prevention and intervention - Collaboration with mediators, health and educational centers - Updating, reissuing and distribution of the guide on prevention and intervention before FGM - Communication and online dissemination

Actions: -Diffusion of the project and selection of entities. -Coordination meeting. -Training courses for peer educators or health agents. HIV prevention and health promotion actions in formal and non-formal contexts. -Distribution of preventive and informative material (brochures). -Coordination, monitoring and evaluation.

F. Start: 02/22/2019 Planned Activities: Entrustment of management to the state company Ingeniería de Sistemas para la Defensa de España (ISDEFE) S.A, S.M.E, MP (ISDEFE). Results: Support and expand the existing capacity at the national level in the area of visa policy, taking into account, in particular, new technologies, developments and / or regulations in relation to the management of migratory flows.

name: 2016 Annual Report on Racism in Spain
description: The project allows us to know more precisely the reality about racism in our country. Operational objectives: - Document the situation of racism in the Spanish State during the 2015 period by publishing the 2016 Annual Report, - Systematically compile the information issued in the Spanish state press during the 2016 period for subsequent documentation of the state of racism in the edition of the Annual Report 2017. Activities: - Classification and filing in the Database of the news of 2016, - Quantitative analysis of the news of 2015, - Complete the collection of cases of the OID, classification, statistical treatment and qualitative analysis, - Managing articles for the 2016 Report, - Writing and preparing the 2016 Report, - Dissemination of the 2016 Annual Report, - Coordination meetings.

It is designed with a comprehensive intervention methodology, based on the gender perspective, with the aim of evaluating the differentiated impact of the actions in all areas and phases of the project (design, execution, monitoring and evaluation). Planned actions: Social intervention to improve social integration and its integral development Reception to improve personal autonomy in Spain Economic aid to prevent Social exclusion Psychological care.

name: CETI Melilla Retorno
description: The CETIs are part of the public Network of Migration Centers, conceived as first reception facilities and intended to provide services and basic benefits to the NTP community that arrives in Ceuta and Melilla. This project includes the remuneration of the direct staff of the CETI of Melilla (management, technical staff for Social Care, Training, leisure, and free time, and administrative staff) and contracts for supplies and maintenance of facilities, and services (Accommodation and meals; Attention sanitary). The actions are complemented by other projects financed by NGOs (Psychological care; Legal care). The total EU contribution is divided into two different files (ES / 2017 / PR / 5101 and ES / 2017 / PR / 5111), according to the proportion of residents in the financial year 2017 for each target group of the specific objective SO1 and SO3 .

name: Solidarity Consulate

Operational objectives: - Psychosocial support and social orientation - Carry out a first comprehensive reception, orientation and accompaniment. - Carry out psychological support. - Participate in the activities of the Cabiria Comprehensive Service. Planned actions: - Intervention of 4 teams on the street - Dissemination of the project - Creation of an action network - Cabira Comprehensive Care Service - Referral and coordination with other resources.

name: Acquisition of equipment for the prevention and fight against organized crime

name: CAR Valencia
description: Refugee reception centers (CARs) are public establishments designed to guarantee the coverage of basic needs and facilitate the integration of IP applicants and beneficiaries who lack financial means. Services: Accommodation, meals. Information, advice. Guidance for incorporation into the educational, health and social system. Psychological attention. Specialized social care. Support for language learning, basic social skills. Occupational, leisure, free time activities. Awareness-raising activities aimed at the host society. The project includes the salaries of the staff of the CAR of Valencia (management, technical and administrative staff) and contracts for supplies and maintenance of facilities and services.

name: Basic acquisition of language, history, institutions, organization, culture, values ...
description: The project seeks to provide advice and assistance in areas such as housing, livelihoods, administrative and legal advice. Actions to inform third-country nationals about the society that receives them and actions that allow them to adapt to it. Measures focused on education, including language training and skills prior to seeking employment (Spanish language and culture courses). The project is aimed at NTP individuals and families with little or no economic resources, without a social network and with special attention to vulnerable migrants. Actions: - Reception, information and orientation: - Legal advice for procedures and procedures. - Activities for their social integration through knowledge of culture and language. - Orientation and advisory services in housing matters

name: Psychosocial support service for migrant women

With the execution of the reform works project, the aim is to improve the living conditions of the building floor where the premises of the Algeciras Police Cooperation Center will be located, correcting the deficiencies that it presents as it is an old building.

description: Description: Maintenance and renovation of the physical and logical equipment used by the agencies of the police forces to carry out missions in the fight against terrorism and organized crime. Results achieved: Maintenance of the location systems of the CNP and DGGC General Police Station; Acquisition of covert monitoring systems for electronic devices; Expansion of the monitoring beacon fleet; Acquisition of location systems for the Directorate of Special Systems of the DGPO; Acquisition of an identification and location system for mobile telephony terminals.

Location: Madrid, Barcelona, Burgos, Elche, Guadalajara, Lucena, Murcia, Valladolid, Salamanca and Valencia.

Impact at the national level. The relevance of the project is framed in Article 5 of Regulation 516/2014 and PN ONIOEl. Actions of Reception and Integration in asylum. Actions: Combination of specific events that due to their characteristics have a very important impact on the host society (such as World Refugee Day) with sustained campaigns (such as the film series); combine the preparation and dissemination of information with the creation and promotion of suitable spaces, events and activities; use various communication channels (online and offline); harmonize different media (intertwining the most classic with new technologies).

name: Network and communication system CN Police and Civil G organized crime and terrorism
description: The objective of this project is the acquisition of a network and communications infrastructure, hardware and software, which allows the State security forces and bodies to be enabled in the fight against terrorism and organized crime. List of equipment acquired: four servers and two storage cabinets for the DGGC, a server and storage unit for the CNP's information units and a software module for information management.

name: Automatic ten-digit identification system (SAID)
description: SAID is a fingerprint management system in the police field. It is installed throughout the national sphere, except in the Basque Country. Your data is exploited by the CNP, the GC, the Mossos d'Esquadra (MDE) and the PFN. It was acquired from the company COGENT (today 3M ESPAÑA, SA) by the Secretary of State for Security - General Sub-Directorate of Information Systems and Communications for Security (SGSICS) in 2008. It is necessary to extend the maintenance of physical systems and logic offered for a period of no less than 4 years, from the end of the initial warranty period.

name: Promotion of residential non-discrimination of immigrants
description: Gnral Obj: Promote equal treatment. Recipients: NTP who have suffered direct or indirect discrimination, especially women (60%), Social entities and Homeowners. Madrid Objectives: -Detect and address situations of residential discrimination -Visitize the causes and consequences of residential discrimination -Detect and intervene in situations of multiple discrimination Actions: -Aimed at preventing and alleviating situations of direct and indirect discrimination -Following analysis of previous years , We start from four key problems: prejudice towards the immigrant population, inadequate residential provision system, inadequate information and difficult to access, and lack of social and / or family networks. To address them we have divided the activities into four blocks: detection, information, awareness and intervention.

description: Intervention in the community sphere that provides resources to favor the integration of immigrants and promote coexistence relations in an area characterized by the coexistence of citizens of different origins. The intervention supported by shared work with social agents in the territory, to avoid and / or overcome situations of social exclusion derived from the high rate of diversity in the area and promote the development of a shared and inclusive local space. It is articulated around 4 areas of action: Coexistence, Education, Social Services and Inclusion and Health, which work in coordination to cover needs detected and that affect the relations of coexistence between native neighbors and NTP. It can include rapprochement and dialogue actions between NTP and the host society according to article 9 f) Regulation 516/2014

name: Host school. Breaking stereotypes
description: The project develops a comprehensive strategy of awareness and work at the local and community level to improve society's perception of the reception of refugees, favoring their integration. It also aims to channel the solidarity generated in said communities through specific actions of direct accompaniment to refugees. The relevance of the project is framed within Art.5 of Regí 516/2014 and PN ONIOEl Actions for reception and integration in asylum. Work at the local level will make it possible to organize host groups that facilitate direct contact with refugees, acting as hosts in their neighborhoods and communities, to eliminate prejudices and favor the reception and integration of IP beneficiaries. Geographical location, mainly Madrid because it stands out in the number of shelters and integration of IP beneficiaries. ^

The Action contributes to the prevention and fight against terrorism in all its aspects, aligning itself with the new political priorities of the EU.

This project was included in CF2016 (ES / 2014 / PR / 0039) and 2017 (ES / 2016 / PR / 0102) with an EU contribution of € 153,486.96 and € 195,403.39 respectively, declared as closed with final payment in each account . The RA has signed Administrative Decision with beneficiary that includes the EU contribution of the 3 accounts (€ 462,333.22) as it is the same project.

These actions are aimed at the general population, although paying special attention to the immigrant population and considering the youngest as a group of special interest: childhood, youth and their families.

name: Extracurricular educational program

Operational objectives: - Prevent absenteeism, dropouts and school failure among minors and involve families and educational agents in the process of educational insertion, - Promote the educational framework as a means of integration into the host society, promoting social participation and the acquisition of social, personal and educational skills. Planned actions: - Diffusion, extracurricular support, Spanish learning, - School and family mediation, Socio-family intervention, - Awareness and integration in leisure and free time and interculturality, Networking.

name: 01 Assisted and reintegration
description: The RVA project "Assisted IV Homes" is intended for non-EU people from Latin America in a regular and irregular administrative situation, with more than 6 months of stay in Spain and who are in a situation of social vulnerability. The objectives are framed according to the lines of action of the project: - selection of beneficiaries, making the return and favoring positive reintegration in the countries of precedence. In order to better carry it out, referral strategies are established with other organizations, individual itineraries are designed and a gender transversal approach is applied, favoring the positive reintegration of the beneficiaries in their countries of origin. Through the realization of "Assisted IV Homes" we maintain the required quality levels, demonstrating the efficiency of our management.

name: Reinstallation of equipment Sist. Identify License plates (SIAM-GC) FarhanaMelilla border
description: Objective: This project consists of the improvement and maintenance of the SIAM System through the remodeling of the Farhana Border Crossing Site. Main activities: This project started in January 2016. Since then, Phases I and II have been executed. In the framework of CF 2018, Phase III is executed, being: - Phase III (present project): Reinstallation of the SIAM so that the operation of the system is normal (two roads out of Spain and three road inlet sense, one for use on motorcycles). Phase object of the project in CF 2018. Expected results: Guarantee the securof the Southern border of the EU, enhancing effectiveness in the fight against irregular migration, through the motorization of the border Crossing from the command and control center of the Comandancia.

name: Farhan Border Post reform work;
description: Summary: the Farhana border crossing, due to the intensive use of the facilities, has become obsolete. To improve border control services and the conditions for providing them, it is advisable to carry out the necessary actions for their reform. F. Start: 07/28/2016 F. Start expense: 07/30/2018 Activities: to carry out the works, a contract is formalized by open procedure that begins on 07/28/2016 (Stakeout verification report). Thus, there will be more regulation when crossing the border as the vehicle entrance lanes, the pedestrian entrance and exit areas, improvements to the canopies and the construction of a new administrative building will be remodeled. Result: the effective expansion of the existing capacities to date in the management of external borders.

The projects executed have affected 7 Centers: Algeciras, Tarifa, Madrid, Barcelona, Valencia, Murcia and Tenerife. The projects carried out have contributed to improving the infrastructures of the Centers (eg, repair of gutters and roofs, intercom system, etc.), as well as the security conditions of inmates and officials (eg. Guard post, drafting of the fire prevention project, etc.).

Awareness activities inside and outside the neighborhood. The main idea is to promote knowledge of the other, transforming the exclusive differentiation into a more adequate perception of enrichment and respect for the peculiarities of each community. name: ARGOS system installation on Civil Guard ships
description: Argos is a satellite system that collects, processes and disseminates environmental information from fixed and mobile platforms around the world. The system uses both ground and satellite resources to carry out its mission. This ARGOS system is specially designed for applications of detection, recognition, identification and interception of any vessel, as well as to aid navigation in conditions of poor visibility or at night. For this, in addition to the IR sensors, it has an automatic tracking capability that allows you to "hook" ("track") the target, so that it can be tracked so that it is not lost from the field of vision at any time. Two of these systems, previously acquired, are integrated in two separate Civil Guard ships.

The training courses are aimed at pilots and helicopter / aircraft crews (Civil Guard) in charge of border surveillance.

The relevance of the project is framed within Art.5 of Regí 516/2014 and PN ONIOEl Actions for reception and integration in asylum. The campaign is aimed at the general population, members of the Spanish Red Cross (volunteers, partners and workers), public entities, educational centers with NTP and IP beneficiaries, associations and groups of citizens, multiplier agents Through the Migrar la Foundation awareness campaign will have a continuous dissemination nationwide. In addition, the International Movement of CRE and Red Crescent will seek synergies with initiatives in Europe.

This will be done through: 1- Two online courses adapted for people with hearing impairment of the Spanish language and culture 2- Awareness in consulates, refugee centers and the Cervantes Institute of the specific needs of NTP with hearing impairment. 3- the creation of a web platform where you can find the information and adapted materials on the nationality access test (CCSE) for NTP with hearing impairment. 4- Updating of the contents of the information guide of the website and app.

name: Program to eradicate female genital mutilation-2016
description: Project for the eradication of female genital mutilation (FGM) through the reissue of a prevention and good practices manual, published in 2014, with which to sensitize society and prevent the continuation of these practices both in Spain and in the countries of origin. The project proposes the update of the guide, including the common protocol of "Sanitary action in genital mutilation", the government declaration on the occasion of the International day of zero tolerance to FGM in 2015 and 2016, and Law 1/2015 of reform of the penal code. The manual will be translated into English and French and will be used as awareness material in journeys for professionals.

name: Modernization and expansion SIVE Huelva
description: The objective of the SIVE system is to guarantee the coverage of the southern border of the European Union, enhancing the effectiveness of the Civil Guard in the performance of this function by establishing an operating system in the fight against illegal immigration, fundamentally against networks crafty. As of today, there are limitations in the operation of this system in the province of Huelva, mainly due to the wear and tear of the equipment, the obsolescence of the system technology and the need to implement new technologies, in coherence with the evolution of the system. . Consequently, and in order to maintain the operation of the system in the province of Huelva, it is necessary to update and modernize it.

name: FAMOUS – European Future High Mobility Augmented Armoured System
description: FAMOUS will optimize synergies, standardization and interoperability capabilities in relation to land armoured vehicles. The project “European Future Highly Mobile Augmented Armoured Systems” (FAMOUS) aims at maximizing synergies, standardization and interoperability capabilities of armoured vehicles to address highly demanding requirements while introducing innovative and promising new technologies and concepts. Several types of vehicles are targeted, such as future All-Terrain Vehicle (ATV), Light Armoured Vehicle (LAV) and Main Battle Tank (MBT) upgrades.

name: LOTUS
description: The LOTUS project will address feasibility, detailed design, prototyping and testing of a low-observable, airworthy and interoperable tactical RPAS system, targeted at ISR missions. The development will include: a mothership TRPAS equipped with ISR sensors, designed for low observability and high endurance, incorporating a self-protection system against enemy threats; a system of tube-launched, foldable-wing drones, deployable from the mothership, while this later remains at a safe distance; on-board sensor data processing capabilities for target detection, recognition, identification and classification; and a ground station. Related PESCO project: Not Applicable
indexText: {"tags":[],"topicName":"Development of a low-observable tactical RPAS with the capability to provide near real time information and with modern self-protection","callName":"Permanent air or space capabilities for Intelligence, Surveillance and Reconnaissance (ISR) and communication, tactical Remotely Piloted Air Systems (RPAS) and sensor suite for integration into air-traffic management"}
callName: Permanent air or space capabilities for Intelligence, Surveillance and Reconnaissance (ISR) and communication, tactical Remotely Piloted Air Systems (RPAS) and sensor suite for integration into air-traffic management
topicName: Development of a low-observable tactical RPAS with the capability to provide near real time information and with modern self-protection

name: Police Performance Assurance Project (POSU)
description: The Police Board centrally procures the necessary protective equipment , specifically defined for police departments, to ensure performance and occupational safety in the fight against terrorism. The equipment to be procured will be distributed to the police units on the basis of a needs assessment to be determined separately .

name: Development of a quality system for demanding technical criminal investigations (RITU)
description: The project is to develop the operation of police technical forensic centers so that fingerprint and DNA tests can be accredited in accordance with the requirements of international standards (ISO 17025). Police departments will apply for accreditation from the FINAS accreditation service in 2018 at the latest. The aim is also to reduce the total cost of technical criminal investigations through better quality , in which case only high-quality samples whose probative value cannot be disputed or questioned will be examined .

name: International Information Exchange Development Project (KATI)
description: The implementation includes the technical implementation of the case management system UMA for the new registry inspection functionality and the construction of integration with the national interface for searches . According to the Finnish Immigration Service's preliminary plans, ETIAS searches would be carried out as largely or even fully as possible . As a result of the changes, the Finnish Immigration Service will be able to carry out measures in accordance with EU legislation and use the ETIAS system reliably, safely and smoothly through its information system . In addition, additional information provided by ETIAS can be used to support the decision-making process .

name: MOBILE WHEEL
description: The project carries out a preliminary study related to the work and working conditions, the definition of the application , its implementation and commissioning with information security audits. The project implements an application for mobile border controls that technically and functionally meets today's requirements and streamlines the performance of border controls.

name: Critical infrastructure vulnerability and the authorities of the functional capacity (STONE)
description: The project will develop up-to-date tools for assessing the critical infrastructure's risk management capacity and the operational capacity of public authorities . A simulation method will be developed for capacity assessment and preparedness training of police and rescue authorities, addressing in particular vulnerabilities in the exchange of information, situational awareness and management between the private and public sectors and authorities . For example , a self-assessment tool (stress test) that can be connected to the ICT system of the Service Security Center will be customized for service providers , which will be piloted at the end of the project in a few operating units. Interdependencies estimating the aim to promote the cross-sectoral approach and cooperation situations under control. The aim is to provoke a discussion about the needs and organization of cooperation . The planning of forms of cooperation will be launched with the support of the steering group in a workshop-type final seminar.

name: Data transmission of mobile units
description: The aim of the project is to increase the efficiency of the operational situation and to facilitate the management of the situation . The project consists of a testing phase and the implementation of a system tested to be operational. The project will be implemented by the Border Guard and commercial suppliers .

name: CYBER EXIT - Breaking the criminal cycle of young cybercriminals
description: The project targets young people aged around 15-25 who have already committed a cybercrime or are at risk of using IT skills for criminal activities. The operating model to be created is a planned early intervention based on the researched information . The project has international role models (including the Netherlands and the United Kingdom). In Finland , a study has been carried out by KRP on the subject in 2019, which examines the nature, motives and backgrounds of young cybercriminals . Based on personal characteristics, in addition to the harm and crime they cause , young cybercriminals are vulnerable to the recruitment of organized crime . Many potential young people are technically very skilled, but skills are easily channeled to the wrong targets. The aim is to address the means by which young potential cybercriminals are identified and diverted from crime, or at best prevent the young person's first crime.

name: Condensed phase FTIR measuring device for drug crime to be connected to existing GC-MS measuring equipment
description: The Customs Laboratory provides analysis services for the needs of Customs and the police in crime prevention , among other things . One of the most important tasks is analyzes related to the identification of drugs and modified drugs. The aim of the project is to raise the technical level of the Customs Laboratory with the acquired measuring device and its combination with another measuring device as a completely new type of measuring device , so that high-quality, reliable and efficient drug and modified drug identification analytics can continue to be produced .

name: Finland's national visa information system SUVI
description: Maintained by the availability of the Finnish national visa information system SUVI at the Ministry for Foreign Affairs and stakeholders. The information system is a sub-register of visa matters in the Aliens Register. The register of aliens is regulated by law (1270/1997). The data stored in the Suvi system shall also be stored in the common VIS information system of the Member States . Foreigners will be held and used foreign entry and leaving the country, as well as residence and work relating to the handling, decision-making and control issues for, to protect the national security and the security clearance Act (726/2014) referred to in the safety report tekemiseksi.Järjestelmää use different ministries and public authorities (the police all organizations, Border Guard, Customs, Finnish Immigration Service, PLM, Regional State Administrative Agency). There are more than 5000 national users of the system . The system is connected to the common VIS information system of the other Schengen area .

name: PEES - Police changes to implement the EES regulation
description: The PEES project of the Police Board implements the changes to police information systems required by the Regulation of the European Parliament and the Council (2017/2226) . At present, police information systems are unable to meet the objective of the regulation, so changes need to be made. The National Board of Police has identified that changes are primarily needed to the RENKI joint survey system . The aim of this project is to plan and implement the changes needed to the RENKI joint survey system to implement the requirements of the Regulation .

name: FINSIU exercises
description: Develop and maintain joint police and border capacity to interrupt and control terrorist acts . Ensure compatibility between management and situational awareness systems and communications . On the basis of events related to terrorism , identify the best practices of different countries and take them into account, where applicable, in the activities of domestic authorities. The aim is to promote co-ordinated co-operation between the special police unit and the corresponding units of the EU countries in preparing for terrorism . The exercises train the authorities and ensure that the exchange of information works in real situations by trying to minimize risks. The Police Task Force, the Border, the Defense Forces and police trained in demanding and special situations and the dismantling of explosives will be involved, as appropriate , to develop the performance of the authorities nationwide. In addition, EU countries participate in the project through the Atlas network.

name: Development of a case management system for secret coercive measures (SALPA II)
description: The SALPA II project will further develop centralized case management of clandestine coercive measures, thus ensuring consistent and regulatory use of methods. At the same time, information processes are streamlined and the conditions for legality control are created .

name: Improving MRTV
description: The Border Guard continuously maintains, develops and expands its technical control systems. The aim of this project is to improve the technical control of land borders in south-eastern Finland. The preliminary design of the project has been done as my own work. In the spring of 2018, the preliminary plans will be presented to the project implementer, who will be asked to submit a bid in accordance with the plans. Following the completion of commercial preparation and design, the work is scheduled to begin in late summer 2018. The goal is to complete the work by the end of the year . The focus of the project is to increase the number of cameras and the density of cameras and detectors in the surveillance system. This also requires increased electrical and fiber cabling. The revamped technology improves detection and identification security as well as night vision.

name: Liaison activities in Beijing and Moscow II
